text.tspan: 2）users 看不到 project 怎样 contribute？
所有 contributors 必需先买产品！
1）洗厕所冇人肯做，必然要提升 offer
则引申到 bidding 与 voting 的问题
每件工作有个 offer，但 offer price 谁决定？
Voters can respond to the bidding by:
How to deal with discrepancy between bid and vote?
The dependency graph can help us see which tasks are "blocking"
Blocking tasks should appreciate in value -- but how fast?
这个项目跟 news voting 的性质颇不同
